question: You are unhappy about a plan to make your local airport bigger and increase the number of flights. You live near the airport.Write a letter to your local newspaper. In your letterexplain where you livedescribe the problemgive reasons why you do not want this development
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction with the new development of increasing the number of flights in the local airport.

I live in Enugu state,just beside the airport and developing this aspect is irrelevant at this point. The area where the airport is located is very remote and poorly developed. I believe there are a lot of problems needed to be rectified there .

This town has greater problems like bad roads and water pollution . Therefore, I believe the problems listed above are more demanding than increasing the number of aeroplanes. Focusing on a minor issue like this will only result in the underdevelopment of this place. So, I suggest the major problems are worked on instead. I will appreciate it if my request is recognized and attended to immediately. For more enquiries please call 09048567312. Thank you for your time.
